H0.text: Meter stick is the best tool for measuring the temperature of lake water.

H1.text: Balance is the best tool for measuring the temperature of lake water.

H2.text: Graduated cylinder is the best tool for measuring the temperature of lake water.

H3.text: Thermometer is the best tool for measuring the temperature of lake water.

A4.text: Thermometers are used in meteorology and climatology in various levels of the atmosphere and oceans.
